View on GitHub

Uninstalling the {PluginNameTitle}

  1. In your IDE, navigate to Help → Installation Details.

  2. In the Installed Software tab, select Windup Feature and Windup Feature Developer Resources.

    Press the Ctrl key to select multiple rows.

  3. Select Uninstall.

  4. Review the details and click Finish to uninstall the plugin.

  5. Restart your IDE for the changes to take effect.

windup-documentation is maintained by windup.
